name: Barbell Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps by pressing a barbell upwards from a flat bench.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
description: Targets the upper portion of the pectoralis major, as well as the anterior deltoids and triceps.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
description: Focuses on the lower pectoral muscles by pressing a barbell on a declined bench.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: A variation of the bench press using dumbbells, allowing for a greater range of motion and independent arm work.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Emphasizes the upper chest using dumbbells on an incline bench.

name: Decline Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Targets the lower chest using dumbbells on a decline bench.

name: Dumbbell Fly
description: An isolation exercise that stretches and contracts the pectoral muscles through a wide arc.

name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
description: Targets the upper chest with a flying motion on an incline bench.

name: Cable Crossover
description: A cable exercise that provides constant tension on the chest muscles through a full range of motion.

name: Push-up
description: A fundamental bodyweight exercise that builds chest, shoulder, and tricep strength.

name: Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise performed on parallel bars, targeting the lower chest and triceps.

name: Machine Chest Press
description: A guided pressing movement that provides stability and focuses on the chest muscles.

name: Pec Deck Machine
description: An isolation machine for the chest, mimicking a fly movement.

name: Barbell Deadlift
description: A full-body compound lift that primarily targets the entire back, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Bent-Over Barbell Row
description: A compound exercise for the middle back, lats, and biceps, performed by rowing a barbell towards the torso.

name: Pull-up
description: A challenging bodyweight exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi and biceps by pulling the body up to a bar.

name: Chin-up
description: A pull-up variation with a supinated (underhand) grip, placing more emphasis on the biceps.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A machine-based exercise that mimics the pull-up motion to target the lats.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: A rowing exercise that targets the middle back, rhomboids, and lats.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
description: A unilateral rowing exercise that allows for a deep stretch and contraction of the lat muscles.

name: T-Bar Row
description: A rowing variation using a T-bar apparatus to target the middle back.

name: Back Extension
description: An exercise that targets the lower back (erector spinae), glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Straight-Arm Pulldown
description: An isolation exercise for the lats using a cable machine.

name: Inverted Row
description: A bodyweight rowing exercise that is a good precursor to pull-ups.

name: Barbell Squat
description: A fundamental compound exercise for overall leg development, targeting quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine exercise that allows for heavy leg pressing in a supported position.

name: Lunge
description: A unilateral exercise that targets the quads, glutes, and hamstrings of each leg individually.

name: Dumbbell Lunge
description: Lunges performed while holding dumbbells to increase the resistance.

name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
description: A hinge movement that primarily targets the hamstrings and glutes.

name: Leg Extension
description: An isolation exercise that specifically targets the quadriceps.

name: Leg Curl
description: An isolation exercise for the hamstrings, performed either lying or seated.

name: Goblet Squat
description: A squat variation holding a single dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level, promoting an upright torso.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: A single-leg squat variation with the rear foot elevated, intensely targeting the quads and glutes.

name: Hip Thrust
description: A powerful exercise that isolates and builds the gluteus maximus.

name: Calf Raise
description: An isolation exercise for the calf muscles (gastrocnemius and soleus).

name: Seated Calf Raise
description: Targets the soleus muscle, a part of the calf, from a seated position.

name: Hack Squat
description: A machine-based squat variation that puts more emphasis on the quadriceps.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
description: A compound exercise for the shoulders, performed by pressing a barbell overhead.

name: Seated Dumbbell Press
description: A shoulder press variation using dumbbells while seated, providing stability and focus.

name: Lateral Raise
description: An isolation exercise that targets the medial (side) deltoid for shoulder width.

name: Front Raise
description: An isolation exercise for the anterior (front) deltoid.

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Raise
description: Targets the posterior (rear) deltoids by raising dumbbells to the side in a bent-over position.

name: Face Pull
description: An excellent exercise for rear delt development and overall shoulder health.

name: Arnold Press
description: A unique dumbbell press that incorporates rotation to hit all three heads of the deltoid.

name: Upright Row
description: A pulling movement that targets the deltoids and upper trapezius muscles.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
description: A guided overhead press that provides stability and isolates the shoulder muscles.

name: Barbell Curl
description: A fundamental mass-building exercise for the biceps.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: A classic bicep exercise using dumbbells, which can be performed seated or standing, alternating or together.

name: Hammer Curl
description: A curl variation with a neutral grip, targeting the brachialis and brachioradialis in addition to the biceps.

name: Preacher Curl
description: An isolation exercise for the biceps using a preacher bench to prevent cheating.

name: Concentration Curl
description: A seated curl with the arm braced against the thigh to strictly isolate the bicep.

name: Cable Curl
description: A bicep curl using a cable machine, providing constant tension throughout the movement.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
description: Performed on an incline bench, this exercise provides a deep stretch on the long head of the bicep.

name: Tricep Pushdown
description: A popular cable exercise that isolates the triceps. Can be done with a rope, V-bar, or straight bar.

name: Skull Crusher
description: A lying tricep extension that is highly effective for building tricep mass.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: A bench press variation with a narrow grip that places more emphasis on the triceps.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
description: Targets the long head of the triceps by extending a dumbbell overhead.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that can be performed on a bench or dip station to target the triceps.

name: Tricep Kickback
description: An isolation exercise that targets the triceps by extending the arm back against gravity.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise that involves maintaining a position similar to a push-up for the maximum possible time.

name: Crunch
description: A classic abdominal exercise that targets the rectus abdominis.

name: Leg Raise
description: An exercise that targets the lower abdominals by raising the legs from a lying position.

name: Russian Twist
description: A core exercise that targets the obliques through a twisting motion.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
description: A challenging core exercise performed by hanging from a bar and raising the legs.

name: Cable Crunch
description: A weighted crunch variation using a cable machine for added resistance.

name: Ab Roller
description: An advanced core exercise using a wheel to extend and contract the torso.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: A dynamic, explosive exercise that works the entire posterior chain, including glutes, hamstrings, and back.

name: Burpee
description: A full-body exercise used in strength training and as an aerobic exercise, involving a squat, a push-up, and a jump.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A calisthenic jump, performed by jumping to a position with the legs spread wide and the hands touching overhead.

name: Mountain Climber
description: A core and cardio exercise that mimics the motion of climbing in a plank position.

name: Box Jump
description: A plyometric exercise that builds explosive power by jumping onto a box.

name: Sled Push
description: A high-intensity exercise that builds lower body strength and cardiovascular endurance by pushing a weighted sled.

name: Battle Ropes
description: A full-body workout that improves strength and endurance by creating waves with heavy ropes.

name: Diamond Push-up
description: A push-up variation with hands close together, forming a diamond shape, to emphasize the triceps.

name: Wide-Grip Push-up
description: A push-up with a wider hand placement to increase the focus on the chest muscles.

name: Pendlay Row
description: A strict, explosive barbell row where the bar rests on the floor between each rep, building back power.

name: Good Morning
description: A hip-hinge exercise with a barbell on the back, excellent for strengthening the hamstrings and lower back.

name: Front Squat
description: A squat variation with the barbell held across the front of the shoulders, emphasizing the quads and core stability.

name: Sumo Deadlift
description: A deadlift variation with a wide stance, targeting the glutes, adductors, and hamstrings.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: A classic exercise performed lying on a bench, stretching the lats and chest.

name: Landmine Press
description: A single-arm overhead press using a landmine attachment, offering a unique angle for shoulder development.

name: Zottman Curl
description: A bicep curl that includes wrist rotation to work both the biceps and forearms.

name: Spider Curl
description: A bicep curl performed on an incline bench facing down, isolating the short head of the bicep.

name: JM Press
description: A hybrid between a close-grip bench press and a skull crusher, known for building tricep strength.

name: Wood Chop
description: A rotational core exercise performed with a cable, mimicking a chopping motion to target the obliques.

name: Turkish Get-Up
description: A complex, multi-step movement that builds total-body stability, strength, and coordination.

name: Renegade Row
description: A challenging exercise combining a plank with a dumbbell row, building core stability and back strength.

name: Pistol Squat
description: An advanced single-leg squat that requires significant strength, balance, and mobility.

name: Glute-Ham Raise (GHR)
description: A powerful exercise for the posterior chain, targeting hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

name: Cable Pull-Through
description: A hip-hinge movement using a low cable pulley to effectively target the glutes and hamstrings.

name: Band Pull-Apart
description: A simple yet effective exercise with a resistance band for rear deltoid and upper back health.

name: Chest-Supported Row
description: A dumbbell row performed while lying face down on an incline bench, isolating the back by removing momentum.

name: Single-Leg RDL
description: A unilateral Romanian deadlift that challenges balance and stability while targeting the hamstring and glute of one leg.

name: Kettlebell Press
description: An overhead press using a kettlebell, which challenges shoulder stability due to its unique weight distribution.

name: Rope Hammer Curl
description: A hammer curl performed with a rope attachment on a cable machine for constant tension.

name: Rope Tricep Pushdown
description: A tricep pushdown using a rope attachment, allowing for a greater range of motion and peak contraction.

name: Side Plank
description: An isometric exercise that focuses on the obliques and core stability.

name: Incline Push-up
description: A push-up variation with hands on an elevated surface, making it easier and targeting the lower chest.

name: Decline Push-up
description: A push-up variation with feet elevated, increasing the difficulty and targeting the upper chest.

name: Assisted Pull-up Machine
description: A machine that provides assistance to help users perform pull-ups and chin-ups.

name: Barbell Shrug
description: An isolation exercise for the trapezius muscles by elevating the shoulders.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
description: A shrug variation using dumbbells, allowing for a more natural arm position.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
description: A primary glute-building exercise performed by thrusting a barbell upwards with the hips.

name: Dumbbell Step-Up
description: A unilateral leg exercise that involves stepping onto a box or bench while holding dumbbells.

name: EZ-Bar Curl
description: A bicep curl using an EZ-curl bar, which can be more comfortable on the wrists than a straight bar.

name: EZ-Bar Skull Crusher
description: A skull crusher performed with an EZ-curl bar for a more wrist-friendly grip.

name: Bicycle Crunch
description: A dynamic core exercise that works the rectus abdominis and obliques by bringing opposite elbows to knees.

name: Handstand Push-up
description: An advanced bodyweight exercise that builds significant shoulder and tricep strength by pressing the body up from a handstand.

name: Muscle-Up
description: An advanced calisthenics movement that combines a pull-up with a dip, performed on a bar or rings.

name: Plate Front Raise
description: A front raise variation using a weight plate, often held like a steering wheel.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
description: A squat performed while holding a kettlebell at the chest, promoting good form and core engagement.

name: Lying Leg Curl
description: A machine exercise for isolating the hamstrings, performed while lying face down.

name: Seated Leg Curl
description: A machine exercise for isolating the hamstrings from a seated position.

name: Incline Chest Press Machine
description: A machine-based press on an incline to target the upper chest with added stability.

name: Seated Overhead Dumbbell Press
description: An overhead press with dumbbells performed while seated to isolate the shoulders.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
description: A lateral raise using a low cable pulley, providing constant tension on the medial deltoid.

name: Preacher Curl Machine
description: A machine that replicates the preacher curl, isolating the biceps.

name: Bench Dip
description: A tricep dip performed with hands on a bench and feet on the floor or another bench.

name: V-Up
description: An advanced core exercise where the body forms a 'V' shape by simultaneously lifting the legs and torso.

name: High-to-Low Cable Fly
description: A cable fly variation with pulleys set high, targeting the lower chest.

name: Low-to-High Cable Fly
description: A cable fly variation with pulleys set low, targeting the upper chest.

name: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldown
description: A lat pulldown with a wide grip to emphasize the outer lats for back width.

name: Close-Grip Lat Pulldown
description: A lat pulldown with a close, underhand grip to target the lower lats and biceps.

name: Hack Squat Machine
description: A squat machine that targets the quads with a unique angle and back support.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
description: A machine for isolating the gluteus medius and minimus by pushing the legs apart against resistance.

name: Hip Adduction Machine
description: A machine for isolating the inner thigh muscles (adductors) by squeezing the legs together.

name: Push Press
description: An explosive overhead press that uses leg drive to lift heavier weight, building power.

name: High Cable Bicep Curl
description: A bicep curl performed with high cable pulleys, excellent for peak contraction.

name: Overhead Cable Tricep Extension
description: A tricep extension using a cable machine, targeting the long head with constant tension.

name: Decline Crunch
description: A crunch performed on a decline bench to increase the range of motion and difficulty.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
description: A bench press performed on a Smith machine, providing a fixed path for safety and isolation.

name: Smith Machine Squat
description: A squat performed on a Smith machine, allowing for different foot placements to target specific leg muscles.

name: Pike Push-up
description: A bodyweight press in a pike position, a progression towards handstand push-ups.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Lunge
description: A lunge performed while holding a kettlebell in the goblet position for added core work.

name: TRX Row
description: A bodyweight row using a TRX suspension trainer, with difficulty adjusted by body angle.

name: TRX Chest Press
description: A bodyweight chest press using a TRX, challenging stability and core strength.

name: Medicine Ball Slam
description: An explosive, high-intensity exercise that builds power and conditioning by slamming a medicine ball into the ground.

name: Zercher Squat
description: A squat variation where the barbell is held in the crook of the elbows, heavily engaging the core and upper back.

name: Cable Kickback
description: A glute isolation exercise using a low cable pulley and an ankle strap.

name: Reverse Pec Deck
description: A machine exercise that targets the rear deltoids and upper back muscles.

name: Reverse Lunge
description: A lunge variation where you step backward, which can be easier on the knees.

name: Sit-up
description: A classic abdominal exercise that involves lifting the entire torso off the floor.

name: Dumbbell Pullover (Cross-Bench)
description: A pullover variation performed with the upper back across a bench, allowing for a greater stretch.

name: Hammer Strength Chest Press
description: A popular plate-loaded machine press that allows for independent arm movement.

name: Hammer Strength Row
description: A plate-loaded machine row that targets the mid-back and lats effectively.

name: Barbell Reverse Lunge
description: A reverse lunge performed with a barbell on the back for increased load.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
description: An RDL performed with dumbbells, excellent for unilateral focus and grip.

name: Standing Calf Raise Machine
description: A machine dedicated to performing calf raises from a standing position.

name: Dumbbell Front Squat
description: A front squat variation holding two dumbbells on the shoulders.

name: Barbell Push Press
description: An explosive overhead press using leg drive to move heavier weight and build power.

name: Seated Barbell Overhead Press
description: A strict overhead press performed while seated to isolate the shoulders.

name: Scott Curl (Preacher Curl with Barbell)
description: A preacher curl performed with a barbell or EZ-bar to isolate the biceps.

name: Lying Dumbbell Tricep Extension
description: A skull crusher variation using dumbbells, allowing for a neutral grip.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: An abdominal exercise performed lying down, involving small, rapid up-and-down leg movements.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
description: A hanging core exercise where the knees are brought up towards the chest, targeting the lower abs.

name: Resistance Band Bicep Curl
description: A bicep curl using resistance bands, providing accommodating resistance.

name: Resistance Band Tricep Pushdown
description: A tricep pushdown using a resistance band anchored high.

name: Resistance Band Squat
description: A squat performed with a resistance band around the knees or under the feet for added tension.

name: Resistance Band Chest Press
description: A chest press using resistance bands, excellent for warm-ups or at-home workouts.

name: Resistance Band Row
description: A rowing motion performed with a resistance band, great for back activation.

name: Resistance Band Overhead Press
description: An overhead press using resistance bands for a portable shoulder workout.

name: Dumbbell Floor Press
description: A bench press variation performed on the floor, limiting the range of motion to focus on lockout strength.

name: Clean and Press
description: A compound, olympic-style lift that involves lifting a barbell from the floor to the shoulders, then pressing it overhead.

name: Snatch
description: An olympic lift where the barbell is lifted from the floor to an overhead position in one continuous motion.

name: Clean and Jerk
description: An olympic lift composed of two movements: the clean (floor to shoulders) and the jerk (shoulders to overhead).

name: Kettlebell Snatch
description: An explosive kettlebell exercise that moves the weight from the floor to an overhead position.

name: Kettlebell Clean and Press
description: A kettlebell complex involving a clean to the rack position followed by an overhead press.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: A simple yet effective exercise for building grip strength, core stability, and overall toughness by carrying heavy weights.

name: Tire Flip
description: A functional, full-body strength exercise that involves flipping a large, heavy tire.

name: High Knees
description: A cardio-intensive exercise that involves running in place while bringing the knees up as high as possible.

name: Cable Front Raise
description: A front raise performed with a low cable pulley for constant tension on the anterior deltoid.

name: Meadows Row
description: A single-arm landmine row variation that targets the upper back and lats from a unique angle.

name: Deficit Deadlift
description: A deadlift performed while standing on a small platform, increasing the range of motion and difficulty off the floor.

name: Pause Squat
description: A squat with a deliberate pause at the bottom of the movement, building strength out of the hole.

name: Spoto Press
description: A bench press variation with a pause just above the chest, improving control and power.

name: Seated Cable Fly
description: A chest fly performed while seated, isolating the pectoral muscles.

name: Wide-Grip Seated Cable Row
description: A seated row with a wide bar to emphasize the upper back and rear deltoids.

name: V-Bar Pulldown
description: A lat pulldown using a V-bar attachment for a close, neutral grip.

name: Leg Press Calf Raise
description: Performing a calf raise using the leg press machine for heavy resistance.

name: Dumbbell Upright Row
description: An upright row performed with dumbbells, allowing for a more comfortable wrist position.

name: Barbell Front Raise
description: A front raise using a barbell for heavier loading of the anterior deltoids.

name: Reverse-Grip Barbell Curl
description: A barbell curl with a pronated (overhand) grip to target the brachioradialis and forearms.

name: Single-Arm Tricep Pushdown
description: A unilateral tricep pushdown to address muscle imbalances.

name: Dragon Flag
description: An advanced core exercise popularized by Bruce Lee, involving lowering the entire body from a vertical position.

name: Toes-to-Bar
description: A CrossFit and gymnastics staple, performed by hanging from a bar and bringing the toes up to touch it.

name: Wall Sit
description: An isometric exercise where you hold a squat position with your back against a wall.

name: Glute Bridge
description: A floor-based exercise that activates and strengthens the glute muscles.

name: Reverse Crunch
description: An ab exercise that targets the lower abs by curling the hips and legs towards the chest.

name: Cable Upright Row
description: An upright row performed with a cable machine for constant tension.
